ext.store_nft_data_on: Store NFT data on Arweave for permanent, immutable storage
ext.decentralized_storage_ensures_nft: Decentralized storage ensures NFT assets remain accessible even if your platform goes offline. IPFS is free but requires pinning services. Arweave charges a one-time fee for permanent storage.
ext.configure_marketplace_fees_and_revenue_s: Configure marketplace fees and revenue structure
ext.marketplace_fees_are_deducted: Marketplace fees are deducted from successful sales. Ensure competitive rates to attract users while maintaining profitability.
ext.percentage_of_sale_price: Percentage of sale price taken as marketplace fee (0-50%)
ext.maximum_royalty_percentage_creators: Maximum royalty percentage creators can set (0-50%)
ext.fixed_fee_charged_when: Fixed fee charged when creating a listing (0 for free listings)
ext.ethereum_address_to_receive_marketplace_: Ethereum address to receive marketplace fees
ext.configure_gas_fee_handling: Configure gas fee handling and optimization features
ext.use_gas-efficient_smart_contract: Use gas-efficient smart contract methods and batch transactions when possible
ext.gas_optimization_includes_lazy: Gas optimization includes lazy minting, batch transfers, and efficient marketplace contracts. This can reduce transaction costs by 20-40%.

ext.configure_legal_pages_and_support_resour: Configure legal pages and support resources

ext.configure_multi-chain_support_and: Configure multi-chain support and blockchain connectivity
ext.allow_nfts_to_be: Allow NFTs to be traded across multiple blockchain networks
ext.integrate_with_external_nft: Integrate with external NFT marketplaces and platforms
ext.allow_syncing_with_opensea: Allow syncing with OpenSea and other major marketplaces
ext.required_for_opensea_collection: Required for OpenSea collection syncing and metadata updates
ext.external_marketplace_integration_allows: External marketplace integration allows automatic listing synchronization and enhanced visibility. API keys are stored encrypted.
ext.configure_social_media_integration: Configure social media integration and community features
ext.enable_user_profiles_following: Enable user profiles, following, likes, and comments
ext.discord_webhook_for_sending: Discord webhook for sending marketplace notifications
ext.twitter_api_key_for_automatic_posting: Twitter API key for automatic posting
ext.social_media_integration_requires: Social media integration requires valid API credentials. Test connections before enabling to ensure proper functionality.
ext.enable_or_disable_different: Enable or disable different trading methods on your marketplace
ext.allow_creators_to_set: Allow creators to set fixed prices for instant purchases
ext.allow_timed_auctions_with_bidding_mechan: Allow timed auctions with bidding mechanisms
ext.allow_users_to_make_offers_on_any_nft: Allow users to make offers on any NFT
ext.allow_selling_multiple_nfts_as_bundles: Allow selling multiple NFTs as bundles

ext.automatically_extend_auctions_when: Automatically extend auctions when bids are placed near the end
ext.configure_creator_verification_and: Configure creator verification and KYC requirements
ext.verification_settings_affect_marketplace: Verification settings affect marketplace trust and compliance. Consider your jurisdiction's requirements.
ext.automatically_grant_verification_status: Automatically grant verification status to new creators after basic checks
ext.mandate_identity_verification_for: Mandate identity verification for transactions above threshold
ext.all_verification_requests_require_admin_: All verification requests require admin approval
ext.additional_verification_requirements_for: Additional verification requirements for high-value NFT transactions
ext.transactions_above_this_usd: Transactions above this USD value will require KYC verification

ext.display_verification_checkmarks_on: Display verification checkmarks on verified creator profiles
ext.verification_badges_help_users: Verification badges help users identify trustworthy creators and authentic collections. They appear on profiles, listings, and search results.
